4KDisplay

text:
The next version of JMeter (3.0) will bring a pseudo-HiDPI mode to manage the HiDPI screen on Windows/Linux.

You can test the RC2 of JMeter 3.0 here:
https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/dev/jmeter/v3.0_RC2/

You need to change (in Options menu) the appearance to Windows or Windows Classic

And change your jmeter.properties file with the suggested value in the docs:
http://home.apache.org/~milamber/jmeter-3.0RC2/docs/usermanual/hints_and_tips.html#hidpi

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 58426 ***
